insert.foreach: insert into goods_mng(aplg_no, gmng_name, gmng_type, gmng_quan) values(#{it.aplg_no}, #{it.gmng_name}, #{it.gmng_type}, #{it.gmng_quan})

mapper.select: select confm_no, confm_name, confm_type, confm_quan ,confm_qrcode, aplg_trans_date, com_name from goods_confm gc, goods_apply ga, company co where ga.aplg_no = gc.aplg_no and co.com_no = ga.com_no and gc.aplg_no = #{aplg_no}
mapper.insert: insert into goods_apply(aplg_no, aplg_name, aplg_reason ,aplg_desti, aplg_trans_date, aplg_hp, com_no) values('GA'||to_char(systimestamp + (INTERVAL '9' HOUR),'YYYYMMDDFF3')||dbms_random.string('x',3), #{aplg_name}, #{aplg_reason} ,#{aplg_desti}, #{aplg_trans_date}, #{aplg_hp}, #{com_no})
